topic.title: PERSON WEIGHT (AT TWO YEAR NEONATAL OUTCOMES ASSESSMENT)
topic.shortdesc: For the National Neonatal Data Set - Two Year Neonatal Outcomes Assessment, where the Weight measurement was not taken on the Two Year Neonatal Outcomes Assessment Date, the actual OBSERVATION DATE (WEIGHT) should be recorded.
